channel.title: How do you add a reset all npc command?
channel.description:
can any1 help me add a reset all npc command ?
thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 09:56:11 AM[/size][hr]?

item.title: How do you add a reset all npc command?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“ronny da codea, post:4, topic:41272”]emm i know the code but i dont know where to add it

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && (playerRights > 1)) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }[/quote]

You bumped a two year old topic just to say that?

Idiot.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add a reset all npc command?

item.title: How do you add a reset all npc command?

item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

^ " I don’t know where to add it " xD

  • Search for your other commands and add it there.

item.title: How do you add a reset all npc command?
item.dc:creator: @ronny_da_codea ronny da codea
item.description:
@ronny_da_codea wrote:

emm i know the code but i dont know where to add it

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && (playerRights > 1)) { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }

Read full topic
